code_samples.title: Code samples
code_samples.description: Some use cases of typical GroupDocs.Merger operations.

sample_1.title: Merging several files
sample_1.content: GroupDocs.Merger allows you to combine several files together into a single file. You can merge whole documents or particular pages from your documents.

csharp.comment_1: Specify desired page numbers or page range to join
csharp.comment_3: Add another DOCX file to merge
csharp.comment_4: Merge DOCX files and save result

java.comment_1: Specify desired page numbers or page range to join
java.comment_3: Add another DOCX file to merge
java.comment_4: Merge DOCX files and save result
